H0.text: Which UK international airport has the code PIK. Perth Airport

H1.text: Which UK international airport has the code PIK. Paisley Airport

H2.text: Which UK international airport has the code PIK. Peterborough Airport

H3.text: Which UK international airport has the code PIK. Prestwick

A4.text: Glasgow Prestwick Airport (IATA: PIK, ICAO: EGPK)

A5.text: The airport serves the urban cluster surrounding Ayr, including Kilmarnock, Irvine, Ardrossan, Troon, Saltcoats, Stevenston, Kilwinning, and Prestwick itself
